messages.subject: NE conf. -- Rowe
messages.msgSnippet: Hi!  I have never been to the Rowe conference center but have heard wonderful things.  It sounds a bit like the place people are describing in Great
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I have never been to the Rowe conference center but have heard
wonderful things. It sounds a bit like the place people are describing
in Great Barrington. It has trails and bunk houses, etc...Usually
prices for conferences held there include food (vegetarian), lodging and
workshops. I can let you know what I think after I attend the Flower
Essence conference which is held there in June. :)

The website is retreat@....
I also wanted to mention a group I have met in Arlington Ma. The web
page is homeschoolingtogether.org and they put together a one day
unschooling conference last April. They may be able to help or have
some ideas to offer. Looking forward to meeting othres! :) Sharon
